text:
bb: much more ... than many more ... than  
much more ... than 后接形容词或不可数名词，many more ... than 后接可数名词 many more people, much more water, much more beautiful  

b7: no, not  
no = not a/any no friend = not a/any friend no water = no water  

b8: no more than, not more than  
no more than 相当于 only, 仅仅，只有：not more than 不多，不都是  

b9: majority, most  
majority 只能修饰可数名词，most 可数，不可数名词  
the majority of people.  

b10: by oneself, for oneself, to oneself  
by oneself 单独的，独立的：for oneself 为自己，to oneself 供自己用的，of oneself 自用的，自动的。The door opened of itself.  

b11: at all, after all  
at all 根本，全然：after all 到最后，毕竟。After all he is a child.  

b12: tall, high  
tall 常指人或动物，high 常指物体。He is tall.  

b13: fast, quickly  
fast 侧重于指人或物体具有运动速度快的特点，quickly 侧重指某事物完成或发生的快。run fast, answer the question quickly.  

b14: high, highly  
high 具体的物，highly 抽象的高，高度的。think highly of.  

b15: healthy, healthful  
healthy 健康的，健康的；healthful 有益于健康的。healthy exercise.  

b16: sleeping, asleep, sleepy  
sleeping 正在睡觉；asleep 睡着，熟睡，只能做表语；sleepy 困的。
